entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chambly
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
